alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 2:23PM EDT until July 25 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CUYAHOGA AND NORTHWESTERN SUMMIT COUNTIES... At 223 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Broadview Heights, or 11 miles south of Cleveland, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. Several minutes of nickel sized hail fell in Seven Hills with this storm. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Parma, North Royalton, Broadview Heights, Brecksville, Seven Hills, Independence, Richfield, Walton Hills, Valley View, Boston Heights and Peninsula. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
